summary: I HAVE HAD THE PLENIUM MANIFOLD FAIL IN MY 1998 BONNEVILLE AND HAVE SPOKEN TO A DEALER ABOUT THIS AND TYEY ARE AWARE OF THIS PROBLEM BUT YET THEY DO NOT HAVE ANY PLANS TO DO ANY TYPE OF RECALL.THE SERVICE DIR. THAT I SPOKE WITH SAID THEY WERE HAVING THIS PROBLEM WITH ALOT OF THE SAME STYLE MOTORS THAT GM PUT OUT BUT THEY HAVE NO PLANS ON FIXING THIS PROBLEM,BUT I HAD TO SPEND 1100.00 OF MY MONEY TO GET THIS PROBLEM FIXED AND THE DEALER JUST SEEMS NOT TO CARE THAT THEY HAVE A PROBLEM.
